name: HummingBird Haunting
description:
***TO FULLY ENJOY THIS GAME, PRESS THE FULLSCREEN BUTTON ON THE BOTTOM-RIGHT CORNER! THANK YOU!***

Made for the Public Domain Jam 2, using the poem Humming-Bird by Hilda Conking. All art and writing was done by me (Norbez).

__________

Thank you for playing. I would love to hear your thoughts. Comment on the Public Domain Jam page, tweet me @NaomiNorbez with #HBHtwine, or e-mail me at minorbez@gmail.com. I look forward to whatever you have to say!

My Patreon.
